SEARCH
Package com.example.queueup.models

Class Image

java.lang.Object
com.example.queueup.models.Image
public class Image extends Object
Represents an image stored in Firebase storage. It includes attributes such as image URL, file path, storage reference ID, image ID, size, type, and creation date. The class provides methods to retrieve images from Firebase as rounded bitmaps.

    • Image

      public Image()
      Default constructor for creating an empty Image object.

    • Image

      public Image(String imageUrl, String filePath, String storageReferenceId, String imageId, long imageSize, String imageType, String creationDate)
      Constructs an Image object with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      imageUrl - The URL of the image.
      filePath - The file path of the image.
      storageReferenceId - The storage reference ID for the image in Firebase.
      imageId - The unique identifier for the image.
      imageSize - The size of the image in bytes.
      imageType - The type of the image (e.g., PNG, JPG).
      creationDate - The creation date of the image.
